C

CallbackToServer - Interface in server
interface used for updating gui must be overridden in implemented class
Captain - Class in pawns
Class that sets the range, value and color and the picture for a captain.
Captain(Pawn.Color) - Constructor for class pawns.Captain
 
ChatPanel - Class in ui
Chat window for multiplayer games.
ChatPanel(Viewer, String, String) - Constructor for class ui.ChatPanel
 
checkMovablePawns() - Method in class game.Logic
Checks the game board for remaining movable pawns.
clear() - Method in class ui.ChatPanel
Clears the chat list
clearPawnList() - Method in class game.PawnList
Fully clears the PawnList object of pawns.
client - package client
 
ClientHandler - Class in server
class that handles the clients and their messages, sends them to the correct user.
ClientHandler(Socket) - Constructor for class server.ClientHandler
constructor that opens the streams for input and output
clonePawn(Pawn, Pawn.Color) - Method in class game.Logic
Creates a new identical instance of a given pawn.
Colonel - Class in pawns
Class that sets the range, value and color and the picture for a colonel.
Colonel(Pawn.Color) - Constructor for class pawns.Colonel
 
Common - Class in ui
Class for creating & customizing UI common components.
Common() - Constructor for class ui.Common
 
compareTo(Score) - Method in class highscore.Score
 
componentHidden(ComponentEvent) - Method in class ui.BoardUI
 
componentHidden(ComponentEvent) - Method in class ui.Matrix
 
componentMoved(ComponentEvent) - Method in class ui.BoardUI
 
componentMoved(ComponentEvent) - Method in class ui.Matrix
 
componentResized(ComponentEvent) - Method in class ui.BoardUI
Resizes the window if the width or height of the main frame is less than the acceptable value.
componentResized(ComponentEvent) - Method in class ui.Matrix
 
componentShown(ComponentEvent) - Method in class ui.BoardUI
 
componentShown(ComponentEvent) - Method in class ui.Matrix
 
Connect - Class in client
class for connecting a player with the server To get and send messages how to use this: 1. make instance of this Connect class (made in controller) 2. make a reference to the InBox class by using Connect.getInBox class 3.
Connect(String, int, Controller) - Constructor for class client.Connect
 
connected() - Method in class server.ClientHandler
put the newly connected client in the allconnected and the available lists
controller - package controller
 
Controller - Class in controller
Main Controller.
Controller() - Constructor for class controller.Controller
Constructor Sets up and starts the game
Controller - Class in server
Connects the ServerUI and the Log it also inherits Observable to be able to tell the server someone is to be disconnected by force
Controller() - Constructor for class server.Controller
Constructor that creates a new ServerUI and new ui that shows connected users
